price: Musa berkata kepada kaumnya, "Mohonlah pertolongan kepada Allah dan bersabarlah. Sesungguhnya bumi (ini) milik Allah; diwariskan-Nya kepada siapa saja yang Dia kehendaki di antara hamba-hamba-Nya. Dan kesudahan (yang baik) adalah bagi orang-orang yang bertakwa."
arabic: قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْۖ إِنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ لِلَّهِ يُورِثُهَا مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَٱلۡعَٰقِبَةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla mūsā liqawmihi is'taʿīnū bil-lahi wa-iṣ'birū inna al-arḍa lillahi yūrithuhā man yashāu min ʿibādihi wal-ʿāqibatu lil'muttaqīna
